007package renderer.pipeline;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.ArrayList;
013
014/**
015   Transform each {@link Vertex} of a {@link Model} from the world
016   coordinate system to the {@link Camera}'s view coordinate system.
017<p>
018   For each {@code Vertex} object in a {@code Model} object, use the
019   {@link Camera}'s world-to-view {@link Matrix} to transform the
020   object's {@code Vertex} coordinates from the world coordinate
021   system to the camera's view coordinate system.
022*/
023public class World2View
024{
025   /**
026      Use a {@link Camera}'s world-to-view {@link Matrix} to transform
027      each {@link Vertex} from the world coordinate system to the camera's
028      view coordinate system.
029
030      @param model   {@link Model} with {@link Vertex} objects in the world coordinate system
031      @param camera  a {@link Camera} with a view {@link Matrix}
032      @return a new {@link Model} with {@link Vertex} objects in the {@link Camera}'s view coordinate system
033   */
034   public static Model world2view(final Model model,
035                                  final Camera camera)
036   {
037      final Matrix viewMatrix = camera.getViewMatrix();
038
039      // A new vertex list to hold the transformed vertices.
040      final List<Vertex> newVertexList =
041                            new ArrayList<>(model.vertexList.size());
042
043      // Replace each Vertex object with one that
044      // contains view coordinates.
045      for (final Vertex v : model.vertexList)
046      {
047         newVertexList.add( viewMatrix.times(v) );
048      }
049
050      return new Model(newVertexList,
051                       model.primitiveList,
052                       model.colorList,
053                       model.name,
054                       model.getMatrix(),
055                       model.nestedModels,
056                       model.textureList,
057                       model.texCoordList,
058                       model.visible,
059                       model.doBackFaceCulling,
060                       model.frontFacingIsCCW,
061                       model.facesHaveTwoSides);
062   }
063
064
065
066   // Private default constructor to enforce noninstantiable class.
067   // See Item 4 in "Effective Java", 3rd Ed, Joshua Bloch.
068   private World2View() {
069      throw new AssertionError();
070   }
071}
